Description: Since new shopping precinct opened its become very congested and dangerous particularly at peak times
Two lanes becomes one at the roundabout
Confusion from drivers not used to road layout and during busy periods it is difficult to cross traffic accessing or exiting freeway
Bridge is too narrow for the volume of traffic

Location: Dunn Bay Road intersection Cyrillian Way Dunsborough
Description: During summer and school holidays standing traffic

The potential for tragedy exists, Years ago, there was broken lines indicating it was safe to overtake. As I pulled out, a vehicle merged from a dip in the road. Fortunately, I was not to committed. Drivers are the main traffic risk. Travelling 20km hour under limit, causing traffic to bank up, even on week days. Causes frustration and risks are taken. I have witnessed some risky overtaking.
You can't see oncoming traffic when you are attempting to turn right from Dower Street onto Pinjarra Road

Location: Indian Ocean Drive - approaching Cervantes turnoff.
Description: Cars overtaking at risk. Caravans/boat trailers going extremely slow and no opportunity to overtake. Caravans/boat trailers all driving together, often 4 deep.
Insufficient width or overtaking lanes from Yallingup Caves Road to Cowarremup.

Location: Crystal Brook Rd & Welshpool Rd E, Wattle Grove
Description: People are increasing speed to get up the Welshpool Rd hill. Slip lane is too short for the right hand turning traffic
Bridge has only one lane coming back into town which bottle necks the traffic and with the lights changing so quick it takes ages to get anywhere
Tailgatting drivers sitting in behind caravan  passing up hill

I regularly drive indian ocean road and I believe the road is good but lacks overtaking lanes between Lancelin and Jurien Bay.  Also signs need to be erected pointing out not to pull out from a side road in front of oncoming vehicles.  This has happened to me on many occasions and I have come close to having a serious accident on 3 occasions. Last Monday a car pulled out from Pinnacles in front of me and then turned off at Cervantes.  There was no one behind me!!
Basically the section south of Cervantes is a twisting road whic never allows anyone to pass. I travel it with a caravan and as cars cannot pass me they get impatient and take risks.
G,E,HWAY ALL OF IT, IS TO NARROW.

Leach Hwy having to go from 3 lanes to 2 lanes to cross Shelley bridge in both directions  I have observed on many occasions during the rush hour period in the morning and evening many vehicles being driven aggressively resulting in many near misses and with so many large trucks using Leach Hwy there will be one day a serious accident.
frequent high speed head on crashes and unsafe overtaking

Location: Corner progress drive and Bibra drive
Description: people not seeing cars from North lake road side   Trying to cross over
